room_title: Escape room "The Locker Room - Pedro's Drug Problem" by Escape House in Rexburg
room_description:
Pedro is in trouble. He got mixed up with the wrong crowd and now he is being held by a drug cartel accused of selling drugs on their turf. But it is all a mistake - Pedro is a good guy and he has never sold drugs in his life.
Out of desperation, he writes a letter to his mom asking that you go to the locker room, where it all went down, to prove what is really going on. Time is ticking. Can you find the evidence before the cartel takes decisive action?
